00052     public function CreatureHistory($moniker,$name,$gender,$genus,$species) {
00053         $this->moniker = $moniker;
00054         $this->name = $name;
00055         $this->gender = $gender;

00065     public function Compile($format=GLST_FORMAT_C3) {
00066         $data = '';
00067         if($format != GLST_FORMAT_C3 && $format != GLST_FORMAT_DS) {
00068             $format = $this->GuessFormat();
00069         }
00070         if($format == GLST_FORMAT_DS) {
00071             $data .= chr(0x27).pack('xxx');
00072         } else {
00073             $data .= chr(0x0C).pack('xxx');
00074         }
00075         $data .= pack('V',1);
00076         $data .= pack('V',32).$this->moniker;
00077         $data .= pack('V',32).$this->moniker; //yeah, twice. Dunno why, CL are bonkers.
00078         $data .= pack('V',strlen($this->name)).$this->name;
00079         $data .= pack('VVVV',$this-gender,$this->genus,$this->species,count($this->events));
00080         foreach($this->events as $event) {
00081                 $data .= $event->Compile();
00082         }
00083         $data .= $this->unknown1;
00084         $data .= $this->unknown2;
00085         if($format == GLST_FORMAT_DS) {
00086             $data .= pack('V',$this->unknown3);
00087             $data .= pack('V',strlen($this->unknown4)).$this->unknown4;
00088         }
00089     }
00090     
00092 
00097     public function GuessFormat() {
00098         return (isset($this->unknown3))?GLST_FORMAT_DS:GLST_FORMAT_C3;
00099     }
00100

00106     public function AddEvent(CreatureHistoryEvent $event) {
00107         $this->events[] = $event;
00108     }

00123     public function CountEvents() {

00132     public function GetEventsByType($type) {
00133         $matchingEvents = array();
00134         foreach($this->events as $event) {
00135             if($event->GetEventType() == $type) {
00136                 $matchingEvents[] = $event;
00137             }
00138         }
00139         return $matchingEvents;
00140     }
